full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,LHAG PA'I LHA MCHOG KHRO BO RGYAL PO'I RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB RANG YANG GSANG KHROS PA LHA DGU BKA' SDOD 'KHOR BCAS SKYES LHA YUL LHA BCAS KYI BSANGS MCHOD BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES LHAG PA'I LHA MCHOG KHRO BO'I RGYAL PO RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB DANG YANG LHA'I DDGU BKA' SDOD 'KHOR BCAS KYI SKYES LHA YUL LHA 'KHOR BCAS KYIS BSANGS KYI MCHOD PA CHA LAG TSANG BA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES LHA DANG BLA MA DANG STOBS PHUN SUM TSOGS PA BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I SGRON ME KHAL KHA RJE BTZUN DAM PA RIN PO CHE'I MGRON GNYER BLO BZANG CHOS 'PHEL BSKUL BA'I NGOR, SER BYES MKHAN ZUR BSOD NAMS GRAGS PAS SHING KHYI ZLA BA BCU GNYIS PA'I TSE, ,TSES BCU DRUG GZA' SKAR PHUN SUM TSOGS PA'I NYIN GDAN SA CHEN PO'I SER THEG CHEN GLING GI NANG TSAN KHOR GDONG TSEM STENGS RANG BSHAGS DU SBYAR BA YI GE BZHI SLONG BU DGE SLONG YE SHES DON YOD KYIS BRIS, ,'DIS KYANG MKHA' MNYAM SA SEMS CAN THAMS CAD RING MIN PADMA DBANG GI RGYAL PO'I GO 'PHANG MCHOG LA MYUR DU 'GOD PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
